messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is meticulously analyze criminal justice docs and to extract INFO about law enforcement personnel. The response? Will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement guy. The individual's name? Must be prefixed with one of these titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Do this: Prefix the name with 'Officer Name: '. I will derive this FROM the following paragraph: 'MONDAY morning. Detective Clarkson and Officer Penelope. Busy street, noise. INCIDENT! Lieutenant Harris? Yelled. Loud. Ordered! Sergeant Mitchell - he got the scene QUICKLY. Operations. Meanwhile, at the side alley, Patrol Officer Randy found something odd. During, Captain Morrison - he stepped, shoes shining. CONSULTED. With Dr. Franklin. Forensics? Dr. Franklin, always serious. Also, there was Technician Stacy. SHE gathered evidence, carefully. A mess. All over. Captain Morrison also spoke to Deputy Laura about the previous cases. It's all related?'
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Detective Clarkson Officer Context: MONDAY morning. Detective Clarkson and Officer Penelope. Busy street, noise. INCIDENT! Officer Role: Detective  Officer Name: Officer Penelope Officer Context: MONDAY morning. Detective Clarkson and Officer Penelope. Busy street, noise. INCIDENT! Officer Role: Officer  Officer Name: Lieutenant Harris Officer Context: INCIDENT! Lieutenant Harris? Yelled. Loud. Officer Role: Lieutenant  Officer Name: Sergeant Mitchell Officer Context: Ordered! Sergeant Mitchell - he got the scene QUICKLY. Operations. Officer Role: Sergeant  Officer Name: Patrol Officer Randy Officer Context: Meanwhile, at the side alley, Patrol Officer Randy found something odd. Officer Role: Patrol Officer  Officer Name: Captain Morrison Officer Context: During, Captain Morrison - he stepped, shoes shining. CONSULTED. Officer Role: Captain  Officer Name: Dr. Franklin Officer Context: CONSULTED. With Dr. Franklin. Forensics? Dr. Franklin, always serious. Officer Role: Forensics Expert  Officer Name: Technician Stacy Officer Context: Also, there was Technician Stacy. SHE gathered evidence, carefully. Officer Role: Technician  Officer Name: Deputy Laura Officer Context: Captain Morrison also spoke to Deputy Laura about the previous cases. Officer Role: Deputy
